title: WTB serves up Limited Edition Wafel grips to benefit Sierra Buttes Trail Stewardship
content: There are big things happening out in the Lost Sierra. The already impressive network of trails are built for all uses, and they’re rapidly expanding. Soon, the Sierra Buttes Trail Stewardship hopes to complete 300 miles of muti-use off-road trail that will connect 15 different communities in the Lost Sierra of California. And since that […]
author: Zach Overholt
